short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ganasX is a browser extension for connecting any dApp to your mobile wallet, through WalletConnect v2

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ganasX is a chrome extension for connecting any dApp to your mobile web3 wallet, through WalletConnect v2
